game.l_dis:
Madness Accelerant – Run n' Gun Madness Combat Action

Madness Accelerant is a 2009 web-based flash game and a shot-for-shot remake of Madness Consternation. Players take control of Hank J. Wimbleton in a brutal run-and-gun shooter packed with non-stop action and epic boss fights.

What is Madness Accelerant?

This game brings the chaotic style of the Madness Combat series into a playable flash experience. Players blast through waves of enemies, picking up dropped weapons and fighting iconic bosses like Tricky the Clown and Mag Agent: Torture.

How to Play Madness Accelerant?

  • Movement: Run, jump, and dodge enemy attacks in fast-paced levels.
  • Shooting: Use guns dropped by enemies and switch between weapons strategically.
  • Boss Battles: Defeat Tricky the Clown and the massive Mag Agent: Torture.
  • Modes: Choose between Normal and the harder Madness Mode for an extra challenge.

Why Play Madness Accelerant Unblocked?

With Madness Accelerant Unblocked, you can relive this classic flash game directly in your browser with no restrictions. It’s perfect for fans of the Madness Combat universe who want quick, intense action gameplay.

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Gameplay: Non-stop shooting and dodging action.
  • Iconic Bosses: Battle Tricky the Clown and Mag Agent: Torture.
  • Weapon Variety: Collect and use guns dropped by fallen enemies.
  • Difficulty Modes: Test yourself in Normal or Madness Mode.
  • Unblocked Browser Play: No downloads required – play instantly online.

Survive the Madness!

Can you defeat Tricky and endure the chaos of Madness Accelerant? Play now unblocked and find out if you have what it takes to survive the Madness universe.
